syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
  "breadcrumbs.enabled": false,
  "debug.showInStatusBar": "always",
  "editor.fontFamily": "FiraCode Nerd Font",
  "editor.fontLigatures": true,
  "editor.fontSize": 13.5,
  "editor.cursorBlinking": "expand",
  "editor.occurrencesHighlight": false,
  "editor.scrollbar.horizontalScrollbarSize": 15,
  "editor.scrollbar.verticalScrollbarSize": 1,
  "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
  "git.confirmSync": false,
  "gitblame.inlineMessageFormat": "blame ${author.name} (${time.ago})",
  "gitblame.statusBarMessageFormat": "${author.name} (${time.ago})",
  "highlight-matching-tag.styles": {
    "opening": {
      "full": {
        "custom": {
          "dark": {
            "borderWidth": "0 0 1px 0",
            "borderColor": "red",
            "borderStyle": "solid",
            "borderRadius": "6px",
            "left": "10px"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "closing": {
      "full": {
        "custom": {
          "dark": {
            "borderWidth": "0 0 1px 0",
            "borderColor": "red",
            "borderStyle": "solid",
            "borderRadius": "6px",
            "right": "10px"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "indentRainbow.indicatorStyle": "light",
  "indentRainbow.lightIndicatorStyleLineWidth": 2,
  "indentRainbow.updateDelay": 50,
  "indentRainbow.errorColor": "",
  "indentRainbow.ignoreErrorLanguages": [
    "html",
    "php"
  ],
  "namespaceResolver.showMessageOnStatusBar": true,
  "peacock.affectEditorGroupBorder": true,
  "peacock.affectActivityBar": true,
  "peacock.affectTabActiveBorder": true,
  "peacock.affectPanelBorder": true,
  "peacock.affectSideBarBorder": true,
  "peacock.affectStatusBar": true,
  "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
  "ShortcutMenuBar.openFilesList": false,
  "ShortcutMenuBar.openSettings": true,
  "ShortcutMenuBar.findReplace": true,
  "ShortcutMenuBar.showCommands": false,
  "ShortcutMenuBar.startDebugging": false,
  "terminal.integrated.cursorStyle": "line",
  "terminal.integrated.cursorStyleInactive": "underline",
  "terminal.integrated.cursorWidth": 2,
  "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 13,
  "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "Hack Nerd Font",
  "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.windows": "PowerShell",
  "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.enabled": true,
  "trailing-spaces.backgroundColor": "rgba(255, 0, 0 ,0.6)",
  "turboConsoleLog.includeFileNameAndLineNum": false,
  "turboConsoleLog.insertEnclosingClass": false,
  "update.mode": "manual",
  "update.showReleaseNotes": false,
  "update.enableWindowsBackgroundUpdates": false,
  "workbench.iconTheme": "r-icons",
  "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
  "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
    "activityBar.activeBackground": "#014241ad",
    "activityBar.border": "#00b9b6",
    "activityBar.background": "#2e2e2e",
    "activityBar.foreground": "#00fffb",
    "activityBar.inactiveForeground": "#028a87",
    "activityBarBadge.background": "#cc068a",
    "activityBarBadge.foreground": "#e7e7e7",
    "commandCenter.border": "#00b9b6",
    "commandCenter.background": "#252525",
    "commandCenter.foreground": "#00a5a2",
    "editorCursor.foreground": "#ffffff",
    "editorGroup.border": "#00b9b6",
    "editor.background": "#1a1a1a",
    "editor.selectionBackground": "#01a3a05b",
    "editor.wordHighlightBackground": "#01a3a05b",
    "focusBorder": "#00b9b6",
    "icon.foreground": "#007c7a",
    "menu.border": "#006636",
    "menu.background": "#014241",
    "menu.selectionBorder": "#ff00008e",
    "menu.selectionBackground": "#252525",
    "menu.separatorBackground": "#006636",
    "menubar.selectionBackground": "#01615fad",
    "menubar.selectionForeground": "#ffffff",
    "minimap.findMatchHighlight": "#e68a00",
    "minimap.selectionHighlight": "#01a3a0",
    "minimap.errorHighlight": "#ff0000",
    "minimap.background": "#1c1c1c",
    "panel.border": "#00b9b6",
    "panel.background": "#1a1a1a",
    "panelTitle.activeBorder": "#00b9b6",
    "panelTitle.activeForeground": "#00b9b6",
    "sash.hoverBorder": "#00b9b6",
    "scrollbarSlider.background": "#00615f",
    "scrollbarSlider.activeBackground": "#00615f",
    "scrollbarSlider.hoverBackground": "#00615f",
    "sideBar.border": "#00b9b6",
    "sideBar.background": "#202020e1",
    "sideBarSectionHeader.border": "#00b9b6",
    "sideBarTitle.foreground": "#00b9b6",
    "sideBarSectionHeader.background": "#014241ad",
    "sideBar.foreground": "#c5c5c5",
    "statusBar.background": "#1b1b1b",
    "statusBar.foreground": "#01c2bf",
    "statusBarItem.hoverBackground": "#3e3e3e",
    "statusBarItem.remoteBackground": "#252525",
    "statusBarItem.remoteForeground": "#e7e7e7",
    "statusBar.border": "#ff00008e",
    "tab.hoverBorder": "#ff9900",
    "tab.hoverBackground": "#01615fad",
    "tab.hoverForeground": "#ffffff",
    "tab.unfocusedActiveBorder": "#ff00008e",
    "tab.unfocusedActiveBorderTop": "#ff00008e",
    "tab.activeBorder": "#00b9b6",
    "tab.activeBorderTop": "#00b9b6",
    "tab.activeForeground": "#00b9b6",
    "tab.activeBackground": "#383838",
    "terminalCursor.foreground": "#FF6800",
    "terminal.foreground": "#01a3a0",
    "terminal.background": "#252525",
    "terminal.border": "#ff00008e",
    "terminalCommandDecoration.defaultBackground": "#ff0000",
    "terminal.tab.activeBorder": "#ff0000",
    "titleBar.activeBackground": "#0153528e",
    "titleBar.activeForeground": "#8b8787",
    "titleBar.inactiveBackground": "#0153528e",
    "titleBar.inactiveForeground": "#8b8787",
    "titleBar.border": "#a002028e",
  }
}"}
